name: Dice in a Casino
description:
HAHA! GREAT NAME

Guide your dice bud, Karl along a Casino filled with pits (as casinos are wont to have)  by giving him dice powered instruction arrows.

The tutorial is a bit wordy, so here's the tl;dr:

Click the lower part of the screen to add instruction arrows (right click to remove), choose dice to power them, and see how Karl moves!
